item.description:
Golf 101 for New Golfers *Golf 102 Scramble Playing Lessons-includes clubs & fees-less than $17/hour * Learn to Golf from the Pros!

GOLF 101 and GOLF 102 is starting its 7th year providing inexpensive high-quantity GOLF lessons - and has taught over 900 people to play great Golf!

PURCHASE YOUR GOLF LESSONS ONLINE AND SAVE 33%!

***FREE Round of Golf with GOLF 101 or GOLF 102 Lessons -- while supplies last***

"Have some fun and stay healthy while you enjoy fresh air and new friends.

Golf makes exercise challenging and fun -- enjoy the health benefits and social activity that Golfing can provide."

DO YOU WANT TO LEARN TO PLAY GOLF OR IMPROVE YOUR GOLFING SKILLS WITHOUT BREAKING THE BANK? Don’t pay $70 per hour for Golf Lessons -Learn from the Pros for less than $17 per hour

GOLF 101- For New & Beginner Golfers - Clubs are included - so this is the perfect opportunity to try Golf - or improve your Golfing Skills. GOLF 101 includes Putting, Chipping, Swinging at the Driving Range, Video Swing Analyses, Golf Rules and Etiquette from our Award Winning Certified Golf Teaching Pro*

GOLF 102 - Scramble Tournament Playing Lessons takes you out on the Golf course to play a 9-hole scramble with the other GOLF102 students - while you receive Playing Lessons from our Award Winning Certified Golf Teaching Pro*

* GOLF 101 and GOLF 102 Certified Golf Teaching Professional® George Claffey III Voted Top 100 Golf Teacher Worldwide by The United States Golf Teachers Federation 2010 and 2012 ( USGTF ) and Discount Golf CT Golfing Instructor

Golf 101 and Golf 102 gives you 6 hours of hands-on Golf Lessons (3 classes of 2 hour lessons) from a Certified Golf Instructor for only $100 (less than $17/hour)

GOLF 101 teaches the basics and is designed for people who want to try the challenging sport of Golf and improve the basic skills, and includes practice at the Driving Range, putting, chipping, and Video Swing Analysis

GOLF 102 puts you on the course to play 9 holes on a GOLF 102 Scramble team, while our Certified Golf Instructor helps you improve your skills in a Scramble style Golf tournament that gives you playing lessons on the course while you compete against other GOLF 102 teams.

After the Golf 102 Lesson, you can continue to golf until dark at no extra charge.

Lessons are held at:

Miner Hills Golf Course and Driving Range
85 Miner Hills Drive
Middletown, CT 06457

Exit 20 of 91 North or South (Country Club Road)

10 minutes from Hartford or New Haven

All equipment including golf balls, golf clubs and fees are included, or you can bring their own clubs.

YOU pick and choose your lesson dates to create your own custom schedule.

In case of rain or bad weather, our Certified Golf Teaching Professional Instructor will call you to reschedule your lesson. Your 3 lessons consist of 2 hours each

Class sizes are kept small to ensure personal attention.

PURCHASE YOUR GOLF LESSONS ONLINE AND SAVE 33%

6 Hours of GOLF 101 or Golf 102 lessons are only $100 online

at http://www.DiscountGolfCT.com or call (860) 436-9449

($150 at the Golf Course if any space remains -cash only * please call ahead for availability)

SPACE IS VERY LIMITED SO RESERVE YOUR SPOT TODAY

The current lesson schedule is available on www.DiscountGolfCT.com

See You On The Course!

www.DiscountGolfCT.com and www.CTGolfTips.com are proud to be a Better Business Bureau Accredited Business.

WHAT OUR STUDENTS ARE SAYING:

" Golf 101 was a fun and inexpensive way to learn Golf from the beginning. Having never golfed before, I was nervous, but our Instructor George did a great job teaching our group, and I am having a great time in Golf 102!"
Rodney P, New Haven CT

" Inexpensive, high quality Lessons in a small group, I made new golfing buddies and am enjoying the game of golf"
June B, Bloomfield CT

" I have taken lessons from golf pros before, but Golf 102 Playing Lessons were more effective and less expensive than any other lessons."
Jim S, Newington CT

" I was not sure if I would enjoy Golfing so I tried Golf 101 and I love it! The Instructor was very patient and answered all my questions, and made the lessons fun!
Gloria W, Milford, CT

" I have never played Golf before and I always wanted to try it. I could not afford lesson with a Golf Pro when I came across this web site on the Internet. The lessons where great, I now I have the basics and a decent swing. I will probably take Golf 102 next month. I recommend Golf 101 to anyone who wants to try Golf, or develop a better swing."
Ed D, Enfield

"Golf 101 was a great experience - I was able to fix me swing that had been haunting me for 20 years!"
Carl T, Vernon

" I had a great time playing Golf at Golf 101 and Golf 102, made some new friends, and have some new golfing buddies"

Andy K, Stratford

PURCHASE YOUR GOLF LESSONS ONLINE AND SAVE 33%

6 Hours of GOLF 101 or Golf 102 lessons are only $100 online

at http://www.DiscountGolfCT.com or call (860) 436-9449

($150 at the Golf Course if any space remains -cash only * please call ahead for availability)

SPACE IS VERY LIMITED SO RESERVE YOUR SPOT TODAY
item.how_to_find_us: Tell the Club House that you are taking GOLF 101 or GOLF 102 Lessons
